metadata.title: CVE-2019-10785 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: dojox is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting in all versions before version1.16.1, 1.15.2, 1.14.5, 1.13.6, 1.12.7 and 1.11.9. This is due todojox.xmpp.util.xmlEncode only encoding the first occurrence of eachcharacter, not all of them.

criterions.comment: dojo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
